title: Malcolm Jenkins | Glenn Howerton | A Closer Look: Trump Uses Nunes Memo to Attack Russia Probe
description:
Seth takes a closer look the misleading memo written by House Republicans that President Trump claims vindicates him in the Russia probe.

Then, Philadelphia Eagles safety Malcolm Jenkins talks about becoming a Super Bowl champion for the second time and why this win means more than his first with the New Orleans Saints. Plus, he discusses his philanthropy work, including engaging with the police and members of the community through his Players Coalition, and explains why he won't accept an invitation to the White House from President Trump after his Super Bowl win.

Late Night producer Sarah Jenks-Daly then goes backstage with Jenkins to discuss the work he's doing to bring awareness to the scourge of mass incarceration across the U.S.

Next, Glenn Howerton talks with Seth about A.P. Bio, reveals what teacher inspired him and explains what it was like growing up abroad.

After that, Late Night producer Kevin Miller talks to Howerton backstage to talk more about his experience making A.P. Bio, and the first time he met Charlie Day.
